originalText.text: I cannot recommend Dr Plesser highly enough. She is a wonderful doctor. Dr Plesser takes time to explain and reassure you. She is caring.  She goes the extra step. I am thankful to have had her as my doctor.

text.text: I cannot recommend Dr Plesser highly enough. She is a wonderful doctor. Dr Plesser takes time to explain and reassure you. She is caring.  She goes the extra step. I am thankful to have had her as my doctor.

originalText.text:
Dr. Plesser is highly knowledgeable and professional
She is very reassuring and pleasant to work with
She calls you back immediately when you have any questions and will even  come in on odd hours to help
She is a gem.
I would give her more stars but this will only allow us to give five.

originalText.text: Dr Kathy Plesser and her Staff are the best of of he best. I had a wonderful experience with a very difficult procedure. It's always scary to get a biopsy and they were so caring and patient, but most importantly- HIGHLY efficient and very thorough. I felt that I could not have been in better hands and I will do all my further procedures with them. Thank you for taking such good care of me and being such expert guides through such a difficult procedure. The slight breeze of humor helped too ;)
